html:
Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_9sx8i08q&referenceId=1_9sx8i08q&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: A new Covid variant has triggered a global alarm and a market selloff - even as the World Health Organization urges caution. Britain banned flights from South Africa and neighboring countries and reimposed quarantine for returning travelers from them, after the UK Health Security Agency said the variant has a spike protein that is dramatically different to the one that vaccines are based. The European Union has since followed suit banning flights - while India, Japan and Israel tightened border controls from the region, sending markets sharply lower in Asia and Europe. Didi, the Chinese ride-hailing app, may have only listed in New York in July but it might be about to delist due to pressure on executives from Chinese regulators citing concerns about data security.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3nU2nGG
